abstract: Florida defeats East Carolina, 28-20, in Birmingham Bowl.
lead_paragraph: Treon Harris threw an 86-yard scoring pass to Ahmad Fulwood, and Vernon Hargreaves III intercepted a pass in the end zone late to preserve Florida’s 28-20 victory over East Carolina on Saturday.
snippet: Treon Harris threw an 86-yard scoring pass to Ahmad Fulwood, and Vernon Hargreaves III intercepted a pass in the end zone late to preserve Florida’s 28-20 victory over East Carolina on Saturday.

headline.main: Florida Hangs On Against East Carolina to Win Birmingham Bowl
